title: Veggie Quesadillas
description: Easy, quick, and tasty veggie quesadillas loaded with a spicy bean and pepper filling, layered with melted cheddar cheese.

stages.label: Preparation
stages.description: Chop, drain, and open everything so it's ready to go when the pan is hot.

steps.instruction: De-seed the {1} and chop them into small pieces.
Open and drain the kidney beans ({1}) and sweetcorn ({2}) in a colander. Give them a quick rinse.
Open the chopped tomatoes ({1}) and have them ready to pour.

steps.hint: If your oven isn't fan-assisted, set it to 190Â°C instead.

stages.label: Cooking
stages.description: Cook the filling on the hob, then assemble and bake the quesadillas.

steps.instruction: Heat {1} of cooking oil in the large pan over medium heat.
Add the chopped red peppers to the pan. Cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally.
steps.hint: You want them softened but still with a bit of bite.

steps.instruction: Add the {1} chopped tomatoes, {2} drained kidney beans, {3} drained sweetcorn, and hot chilli powder to taste. Stir to combine, bring to a boil, then leave uncovered to thicken.
steps.hint: Leaving the lid off lets moisture escape so the filling thickens â€” you don't want it too wet or the tortillas will go soggy.

steps.instruction: Take the pan off the heat. The filling is ready for assembly.

Lightly oil the two oven trays. For each quesadilla (6 total, 3 per tray): place one tortilla down, spread on a layer of bean mixture, add cheese, place a second tortilla, spread more bean mixture, add more cheese, place a third tortilla on top, and finish with a sprinkle of cheese. You'll use {1} tortillas and {2} cheese in total.
steps.hint: Each quesadilla is a triple-decker: tortilla â†’ filling â†’ cheese â†’ tortilla â†’ filling â†’ cheese â†’ tortilla â†’ cheese on top.

triple-decker.title: Layering order
triple-decker.text: Three tortillas with filling and cheese between each layer, plus cheese on top to get a golden crust.

steps.instruction: Place both trays in the preheated oven.
steps.hint: The cheese on top should be melted and golden. Keep an eye on them â€” ovens vary.

steps.instruction: Remove the trays from the oven. Serve with sour cream, a sprinkle of paprika, and fresh coriander.
